name: Teskin County
description: This story begins with a journalist named Ezra, his wife and, son. Ezra is about to go on a trip to Teskin County for a "major publication." The wife hesitates with the idea but wants Ezra to be successful. Ezra wakes up, dead, in a grassy field. Ezra has no clue where he is. The gamer must play through the game to discover the truth for and about Ezra.
